descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffffff][size=3][b]Adds a merchant named Adrianne to the Sacellum Of Boethiah.She sells rare conjuration spellbooks :[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]- Conjure Wrathman[/size]
[size=3]- Conjure Boneman[/size]
[size=3]- Conjure Mistman[/size]
[size=3]- Conjure Dragon priest[/size]
[size=3]- Conjure Dremora Markynaz (Archer)[/size]
[size=3]- Conjure Dremora Kynreeve (Warlock)[/size]
[size=4][i]
[/i][/size][size=3][b]Falion File adds two new alteration spells,four of conjuration and Hist Sap to Falion in Morthal :
[/b][/size]
[size=2][b][i]      Alteration [/i][/b][/size]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]- Prolongued Waterbreathing[/size]
[size=3]- Negate Gravity[/size][/font]
[i][b][size=2]    Conjration [/size][/b][/i]
[size=3]- Conjure Scamp[/size]
[size=3]- Conjure Daedroth[/size]
[size=3]- Conjure Spider Daedra[/size]
[font=Comic Sans MS]- Conjure Hunger[/font]

[font=Arial][b]Nirya File : adds 19 new spells to Niry.Following spells :
[/b][/font]
[i][b][font=Courier New][u]Alteration Spells:[/u][/font][/b][/i]
[font=Comic Sans MS]1.Subterfurge – [/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][i]Muffle Your Movement And Shade Your Appereance 60sec[/i][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS].[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]2.Accelerate - [/size][i][size=2]Increase Your Movement Speed By 150% for 60sec [/size][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]3.Material Fury- [/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][i]Increased Weapon Attack Speed 120% For 30 sec[/i][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS].[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]4.Trance - [/size][i][size=2]Damage Stamina By 1000 pts and stagger the foe[/size][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]5.Fury   – [/size][i][size=2]Increased Health By 50 pts and health reg by 150% and one handed attacks by 100 pts[/size][/i][/font][i][size=2]
[/size][/i][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]6. Waterwalking [/size][i]- for 5 min[/i]
[/font]
[font=Courier New][i][b][u]Illusion Spells:[/u][/b][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]1.Obfscute – [/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][i]chameleon 50% for 90 sec and increased speed 70%[/i][/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]2.Clastrophobia Spell - [/size][i][size=2]posionous fumes constantly grow in area of 30 for 90 sec.[/size][/i]
[/font]
[i][b][font=Courier New][u]Destruction Spells:[/u][/font][/b][/i]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]1.Inffect - -[/size][i] [size=2]Poison  And Paralayze Human Enemiy For 15 Sec[/size][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]2.Heart Attack -[/size][size=2][i] Damage Targets Health By 180 pts[/i][/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]3.Morgana Effect – [/size][i][size=2]Sets Entire Area On Fire,Infflicting 270 pts of fire damage to all nearby living beings.[/size][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]4.Sharp Blades– [/size][i][size=2]enchant equipped weapon with frost damage of 25 pts and drain stamina by 25 pts[/size][/i]
[/font]
[i][b][font=Courier New][u]Restoration Spells:[/u][/font][/b][/i]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]1.Stability - [/size][i][size=2]You do not stagger for 120sec[/size][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]2.Purity -[/size][i][size=2] Cure Disease And Restore Health By 250pts[/size][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]3.Spell Of Taproot -[/size][i][size=2] Cures Poison And Restores All Stamina.[/size][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]4.Recharge - [/size][i][size=2]Regenerate Magicka From Thin Air[/size][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]5.Stimulate Self [/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][i]- 100% magic resistance for 30 sec[/i][/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]6.Stimulate Other [/size][i][size=2]- Gives 100 % magic resistance to nearby allies for 30sec[/size][/i][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]7.Sun Rune[/font]

[size=3]

[color=#f4f4f4][b]Unliving file adds two new items to W. the Unliving in Windhelm :
[/b][/color]
[font=Courier New]- Bloodgrass [i](inherited ingrident properties from Oblivion)[/i]
- Conjure Scorpion [/font][/size]
[font=Courier New][size=3][i]- [/i]It also unlock the recipe for spell : [i]Conjure Haunted Dwemer Soldier [/i],
which summons an dwemer outfited spirit soldier,armed with crossbow.
but to craft an spellbook you must aquire :
    [u]dwemer armor set, black soul gem filled 3x, bone male 3x, briar heart, bear claws, potion of blood[/u][/size][/font]

[i][u][color=#000000][size=3][b]Considering new creatures,all credits goes to Vicn.You can check out his profile,if you have not already.
His creature pack is really top of art if you ask me.
Thx again !
[/b][/size][/color][/u][/i][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Also credits to Elianora and Maeqfaer for sun rune and chameleon spell.[/size][/font][/b]
author: ibrica15
